chapters.title: Chapter 8:  Dragon's Eggs
chapters.info: Metwyn, p. 210—One of Mat's Redarms. He is the best among the Redarms with a sword. He looks like a boy, despite being about ten years older than Mat. He grew up in Cairhien, and has a weakness for tavern brawls. He shares a tent with Harnan, Gorderan, and Fergin.
